page.title: 06The Sidmouth Herald.
page.content: A survey was conducted on Sidmouth's own newspaper,{The Sidmouth Herald, which is published every Saturday. A number of people were asked their views on the newspaper and on{The {Midweek Herald,}which is a free newspaper. The majority of people liked the contents of The Sidmouth Herald and thought it a good local newspaper. A smaller number preferred The Midweek Herald. When we interviewed the Editor of The Sidmouth Herald, we found that the Newspaper was{founded in 1849;}that it takes a full seven days to put it together and that it is{printed in {Bristol. The Herald employs 16 people on a full-time basis and 6 part-time. The{circulation is approximately {7,000.
